text: 20.5-6 1 Pi 2.9, Lep 1.6, 2.11, 20.4 Ñɨn anɨb ak, God gek ned tɨkjakɨpal binɨb okok apun. Binɨb ned tɨkjakɨpal okok, God binɨb suŋtep ne mɨdɨl, tep gaknɨŋ nep yenɨgabal. Tepayaŋ ma kumnɨgabal. Kɨli bɨ God nop sɨbogep sek, Klays nop sɨbogep sek yenɨgabal. Klays ayɨp jɨmñɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop kod mɨdel mɨdel, sub 1,000 ak amnɨgabal. Pen binɨb yokɨp kumɨlak okok, ñɨn nab anɨb ak ma tɨkjakɨnɨgabal. Kɨli kod mɨdel, sub 1,000 ak amnɨgabal.
